text: The following is a list of prime ministers of the Netherlands since the creation of that office in 1848. The prime minister is the chairman of the Council of Ministers. == List of prime ministers == Political parties: ;Christian democratic ;Liberal: ;Social democratic Portrait Portrait Name (born and
